sailing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the sport or activity of travelling in or directing a small boat with sails
sailing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Bud has invited us to go sailing this weekend.
sailing.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a time when a ship leaves a port
sailing.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Luckily, there was another sailing at 2 o'clock.
